t:
She screamed at the police officers, crying uncontrollably, asking them to find who killed her husband.


Good show, she thought, now they won't suspect her.
c:
“Did you see the wife freaking out? She seemed like overreacting.”
“She sure did.”



#scream #police #husband #cry #death #murder #trick #fakelove





Inspired by (ripped off) ‘The Lamb to the Slaughter’.
